mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hellchang_schema.heart(id,title,heart) SELECT #{id}, #{title}, 0 FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM hellchang_schema.heart WHERE id = #{id} and title = #{title});
mapper.delete: delete from `hellchang_schema`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and title=#{title} and target=#{target}
mapper.select: select * from `hellchang_schema`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and title=#{title}
select id,name,target,kg,rep from `hellchang_schema`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and date like CONCAT('%',#{date},'%')
select id,title,shared from `hellchang_schema`.`myRoutine` group by title
select title from `hellchang_schema`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} group by title
select * from `hellchang_schema`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and title=#{title}

select myRoutine.* ,member.name as userName, member.image_path as userImage from hellchang_schema.myRoutine , hellchang_schema.member where myRoutine.id = #{id} and myRoutine.title = #{title} and myRoutine.id = member.id order by seq asc;
mapper.update: update hellchang_schema.heart set heart = heart + 1 where id=#{id} and title = #{title}
